Text: Tastes great and leaves my mouth feeling fresh
Didn't notice any whitening even after 2 weeks
Nice packaging but the cap broke in a week
Gentle on sensitive teeth and works well
Whitening effect is noticeable within days!
Flavor is too strong for me, not a fan
Arrived damaged, packaging was poor
Great for sensitive gums, no irritation at all
No change in whiteness and tastes bad
Well-packaged and refreshing mint flavor
Used for a month, good whitening results after 10 days. Mint flavor is nice and mouth feels fresh. Tube could be bigger for the price.
Didn't work at all. Used twice daily for 3 weeks with no whitening. Taste is okay but too expensive for regular toothpaste.
Great for sensitive teeth! No pain or discomfort and my teeth look whiter. Smooth texture, not gritty like others.
Caused mouth sores and gum irritation within a week. Too harsh for daily use. Had to stop and see dentist.
Perfect whitening toothpaste! Coffee and wine stains are gone after 6 weeks. People notice how white my teeth look now.
Mixed results. Some whitening after 3 weeks but taste is artificial and medicinal. Cap breaks easily and leaks.
Been using for 2 months with great results. Natural-looking whitening and dentist commented on improvement. No aftertaste.
Too thick consistency, doesn't spread well. Minimal whitening after a month. Cleans okay but overpriced for results.
Best whitening toothpaste ever! Tea stains removed in 2 weeks. Coworkers asked if I had professional whitening done.
Average results, very subtle whitening took 2 months. Works as regular toothpaste but not worth the higher price.
Gentle formula perfect for sensitive teeth. Teeth are whiter after 6 weeks with no discomfort. Tube runs out quickly.
Complete waste of money. Damaged cap, bland taste, chalky texture. No whitening after 5 weeks. Bad customer service.
Daily routine staple now. Gradual whitening without enamel damage. Natural brightness, refreshing mint flavor.
Ineffective for coffee stains after 2 months. Works as regular toothpaste but poor whitening results for the price.
Outstanding results! Skeptical at first but teeth significantly brighter in 3 weeks. No sensitivity issues, great consistency.
Good whitening but packaging is poor quality. Cap broke in 2 weeks making storage difficult. Product good, packaging bad.
Very gradual whitening over 7 weeks but gentle on sensitive gums. No irritation like other products. Mild pleasant flavor.
Overhyped and overpriced. No whitening after a month of daily use. Artificial taste with lingering aftertaste. Very disappointed.
Excellent whitening! Wine stains removed in 5 weeks, teeth several shades whiter. Natural results, perfect mint flavor.
Decent product but gradual results. Took 6 weeks to notice change. Tube design makes it hard to squeeze when half empty.
